summary:
Are you a nostalgic player like me?
Do you hate how the Ebony mail suddenly is for sneaky players?
I say: \"Not anymore!\"
This mod aims to Morrowindize several artifacts.
descriptionHtml:
===========
Description:
===========
Are you a nostalgic player like me? Do you hate how the Ebony mail suddenly is for sneaky players?
Well I say no more! This makes an effort to Morrowindize several artifacts.

============================
All Mods from this auther:
============================
- Oblivionized Racial Skill Bonusses and Resistances:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8215
- Morrowindized Racial Skill Bonusses and Resistances:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8670
- Morrowindized Artifacts:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8991
- Caucasian Yokudans aka Greyguards
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16309

===========
Remember:
===========
- Feedback! A mod is only as good as it\'s feedback!
- Put tags on the file that I might have missed. (this will make the file easier to find for others)
- If you like it, Endorse it. (this will tell other people that it is a good mod and it\'s a compliment to me)
- If you love it, Vote for it. (this will tell other people that this is either almost essential or at least something brilliant)

======================================
New Artifact Bonusses and Enchanments:
======================================
Ebony Mail:
- Resist Fire 75%
- Resist Magic 20%
- Armor Rating +50 (because there\'s no shield enchantment... yet)

Masque of Clavicus Vile:
- Fority Speech 30pts

Saviors Hide
- Resist Magic 60%

Volendrung:
- Removed enchantment

Mehrunes Razor:
- 20 Poison Damage

Mace of Molag Bal:
- 15 Absorb Stamina 30 sec
- 20 Absorb Magicka 30 sec

==================
Recommended mods
==================
If you like like this mod the i highly recommend:
- Ancient Spells - Morrowind and Oblivion Spells
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9153

==============
Special Thanks:
==============
QuitWhistler: Logo design
author: coenve
